sentences.sContent: He says Tehran hopes to extend its influence beyond the Middle East, and that it is working with the Taliban, once its archenemy, against coalition forces in Afghanistan.
sentences.sContent_eng: He says Tehran hopes to extend its influence beyond the Middle East, and that it is working with the Taliban, once its archenemy, against coalition forces in Afghanistan.
sentences.sCn: 他说，德黑兰希望把影响力扩大到中东之外。 伊朗正在跟过去的主要敌人塔利班合作，对抗在阿富汗的联军力量。

synos.tran: 主要敌人，大敌；撒旦，魔王

remMethod.val: arch(主要的) + enemy(敌人) → 天敌； 主要敌人

trans.tranCn: 主要敌人，大敌；撒旦，魔王
